thread.title: Lack of awareness in India about cancer, says Lisa Ray
thread.title_full: Lack of awareness in India about cancer, says Lisa Ray - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Lack of awareness in India about cancer, says Lisa Ray
text: New Delhi, Oct 20 (ANI): Canadian actress Lisa Ray, who is promoting awareness of breast cancer, says that in India people still associate cancer to death because of lack of awareness. The actress further said that the media needs to take active participation in spreading awareness about the cause. Lisa, who herself has fought the big C, said that people should start looking at the positive side as such things make one learn a lot about life and themselves. Â»
